title: Chemical properties of water
brief_description: An explanation of the chemical properties of water in terms of the polar nature of the water molecule. Demonstrates chemical reactions of water with metals, metal oxides, non-metal oxides, and salts; shows how water, as a solvent, promotes other chemical reactions.
